comments.text:
User-Agent:       
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110214 Firefox/4.0b12pre

The colors of the audio/video element change if the pref is unchecked.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. open a page containing a an audio or video element
2. uncheck Preferences -> Colors -> Content -> Colors -> "Allow Pages to use their own colors ..."
Actual Results:  
Except for the time markers the audio/video element becomes invisible (white).

Expected Results:  
Keep colors/visibility when unchecking the pref.
comments.creator: kdevel@vogtner.de
